mapper.select: /* Mapper - listTMemberAll*/ SELECT A.TT_NO, A.TT_NAME, A.TT_BIRTH , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GENDER=B.CODE) AS TT_GENDER , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_AUTHORITY=B.CODE) AS TT_AUTHORITY , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.SJTCODE=B.CODE) AS SJTCODE , A.TT_ID, A.TT_PW, A.TT_TRANSFERYEAR, A.TT_PN ,(SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GRADE=B.CODE) AS TT_GRADE , A.TT_CLASS ,TT_EMAIL ,TT_IMAGE ,TT_DELETEYN,TT_INSERTDATE ,TT_UPDATEDATE, TT_ADMINDATE FROM T_MEMBER A WHERE TT_AUTHORITY IN ('2','3') AND TT_DELETEYN='Y' ORDER BY 1

/* Mapper - listTMember*/ SELECT TT_NO, TT_NAME, TT_BIRTH, TT_GENDER, TT_AUTHORITY, SJTCODE, TT_ID, TT_PW, TT_TRANSFERYEAR, TT_PN ,TT_EMAIL ,TT_IMAGE ,TT_DELETEYN ,TT_ADMINDATE FROM T_MEMBER WHERE TT_AUTHORITY = 'N' ORDER BY 1

/* Mapper - listTMember*/ SELECT A.TT_NO, A.TT_NAME, A.TT_BIRTH , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GENDER=B.CODE) AS TT_GENDER , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_AUTHORITY=B.CODE) AS TT_AUTHORITY , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.SJTCODE=B.CODE) AS SJTCODE , A.TT_ID, A.TT_PW, A.TT_TRANSFERYEAR, A.TT_PN , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GRADE=B.CODE) AS TT_GRADE , A.TT_CLASS ,TT_EMAIL ,TT_IMAGE ,TT_DELETEYN,TT_INSERTDATE ,TT_UPDATEDATE, TT_ADMINDATE FROM T_MEMBER A WHERE TT_AUTHORITY = 'Y' ORDER BY 1

/* Mapper - tMemberDetail*/ SELECT A.TT_NO, A.TT_NAME, A.TT_BIRTH , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GENDER=B.CODE) AS TT_GENDER , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_AUTHORITY=B.CODE) AS TT_AUTHORITY , (SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.SJTCODE=B.CODE) AS SJTCODE , A.TT_ID, A.TT_PW, A.TT_TRANSFERYEAR, A.TT_PN ,(SELECT B.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE B WHERE A.TT_GRADE=B.CODE) AS TT_GRADE , A.TT_CLASS ,TT_EMAIL ,TT_IMAGE ,TT_DELETEYN,TT_INSERTDATE ,TT_UPDATEDATE, TT_ADMINDATE FROM T_MEMBER A WHERE A.TT_NO = #{ttNo}
